text: Paweł Tomczyk (born 4 May 1998) is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a forward for Stal Mielec on loan from Lech Poznań. ==Club career== On 20 July 2017 he was loaned to I liga side Podbeskidzie Bielsko-Biała. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Other1 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Lech II Poznań |2015–16 |rowspan="3"|III liga |5||2||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||5||2 |- |2016–17 |29||20||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||29||20 |- |2018–19 |3||5||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||3||5 |- |2019–20 |rowspan="1"|II liga |12||6||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||12||6 |- !colspan="2"| Total !! 49 !! 33 !! colspan="2"|– !! colspan="2"|– !! colspan="2"|– !! 49 !! 33 |- |rowspan="4"|Lech Poznań |2016–17 |rowspan="3"|Ekstraklasa |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||0 |- |2018–19 |10||2||0||0||3||0||colspan="2"|–||13||2 |- |2019–20 |15||3||2||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||17||3 |- !colspan="2"| Total !! 29 !! 5 !! 2 !! 0 !! 3 !! 0 !! 0 !! 0 !! 34 !! 5 |- |rowspan="1"|Podbeskidzie |2017–18 |rowspan="1"|I liga |31||11||3||1||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||34||12 |- |rowspan="1"|Piast Gliwice |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|Ekstraklasa |4||2||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||4||2 |- !colspan="3"|Total !113!!51!!5!!1!!3!!0!!0!!0!!121!!52 |- |} 1 Including Polish SuperCup. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish footballers Category:Poland youth international footballers Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Podbeskidzie Bielsko-Biała players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Sportspeople from Poznań
